jd: From: Arthi, synergent Tech Solutions aarthi@synergent.net Reply to: aarthi@synergent.net Technical Business Analyst (Consultant) - RiskExperience: 12+ YearsNY, NJ – Remote - Candidate from EST time zone The Bank is seeking an experienced Business Analyst/Project Manager to join its Technology department. This individual will work as a Technical Business Analyst responsible for UAT execution & Coordination with users and vendor of Risk Rating system. In addition, this position is also responsible for Data/Business Analysis as part of Enhanced Dual Risk Rating Project. He/she will also be expected to conduct support end to end Project SDLC lifecycle. He/She will be working very closely with external implementation partner and internal IT, Risk, Lending, Underwriting Departments. The successful candidate will have a solid business and technical analysis skill gained within financial services in the banking industry.
